## Description
 Make pulp (Okara) and Soymilk from Soybean after&#10;&#9;&#9;&#9;Washing, Dehulling, Soaking, Milling, Paste&#10;&#9;&#9;&#9;Heating, and Filtration.

|Work Level:|30.0 millisols|
|Power Required:|0.5 kW/hr|
